message.entry: It is not a valid IVI instrument type.
You must provide a driver name.
"{0}" is not a valid method name.
"{0}" is not a valid property name.
"{0}" is not a valid 'DriverDetectionMode' value. Valid values are 'auto' and 'manual'.
Cannot change this property once connection is set up. Disconnect from the instrument and try again.
Failed to connect to instrument. Provide driver name and try again.
Failed to connect to instrument. Check instrument connection.
Connection to the instrument is not established. Connect to the instrument first.
The connection has been established.
More than one instrument driver supports this model. Set 'Driver' property and use getDrivers() method to find the available drivers.
Not a valid IVI Instrument driver.
This object has been deleted. Remove it from your workspace by using the clear command.
Invalid instrument state.
{0}: No connection has been set up with instrument. Type help {1} for more information.
"{0}" is not a valid 'ChannelName' value. Valid channel names are "{1}".
Provide the method name you want to invoke.
The set value {0} is different from instrument value {1}.
Unable to find VISA installation. Type "instrhelp visa" for more information.
The resource is not valid. Please use resources() to find the available resources.
Need to set up the Resource property before communicating with instrument. Use resources() method to find available resources.
Instrument Error
{0} Object: {1}\n
Methods for class {0}:
{0}\n Instrument Settings:\n{1}{2}{3}{4}{5}{6}{7}{8}
{0}\n Communication Properties:\n{1}{2}
Unrecognized driver for {0}. Either install the "{1}" driver and verify its validity using drivers() method, or use one of the identified drivers: {2}.
Cannot parse adapters.config file.
One or more output arguments not assigned during call to "set".
Type has to be 'Fgen', 'Oscilloscope' or 'RFSigGen'.
Unable to detect {0} hardware. Install {1} to support detection.
